text: Military Alliance Members Formed an Empire
Transition your coalition to a military alliance
We will form a coalition with {#recipientsfaction#}, establishing a non-binding agreement to fight mutual enemies
We will form an empire with {#recipientsfaction#} who will become our subject.

A binding military agreement between all members of the alliance; all members of a military alliance vote on war declarations and other pertinent negotiations, and are obliged to accept the result of all votes.

Non-binding military agreement to combat mutual enemies; all members of a coalition vote on whether to accept new members to the group, but all other negotiations, like war declarations, are individual and independent of the coalition.
{#proposersfaction#} invites you to form a military alliance, committing to aid each another in times of war

An agreement to support the greater good of the empire. Supreme power presides with the emperor or empress who dictates on any issues regarding membership or alliance wars. Negotiations like war declarations, are individual and independent of the empire.
Form an empire with alliance members
Leave military alliance to form an empire
We will form a military alliance with {#recipientsfaction#}, committing to aid each another in times of war
Transition your coalition to military alliance
{#proposersfaction#} invites you to form an empire with themselves positioned as emperor

A binding military agreement between all members of the alliance; all members of a military alliance vote on war declarations and other pertinent negotiations, and are obliged to accept the result of all votes.

Non-binding military agreement to combat mutual enemies; all members of a coalition vote on whether to accept new members to the group, but all other negotiations, like war declarations, are individual and independent of the coalition.
We ask our allies in {#proposersalliance#} to form an empire with you as emperor
We will transition {#proposersalliance#} to a military alliance, committing to aid in any wars declared by the alliance
Strengthen the bonds between you and your allies and become a military alliance.
We will form a military alliance with {#recipientsfaction#}, committing to aid each another in times of war
Ask your allies for their support in establishing you as emperor by forming an empire.
{#proposersfaction#} is forming an empire with them as emperor, all who agree will leave {#proposersalliance#}

An agreement to support the greater good of the empire. Supreme power presides with the emperor or empress who dictates on any issues regarding membership or alliance wars. Negotiations like war declarations, are individual and independent of the empire.

We will form an empire with {#proposersfaction#} who will become our subject
